name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend system development, focused on implementing high-performance solutions using **Java**, **Spring** framework, **JPA**, and **JDBC**. Proficient in database technologies including **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, with hands-on experience in messaging systems like **Kafka**, **JMS**, and **RabbitMQ**. Well-versed in CI/CD practices utilizing **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **ArgoCD** for efficient deployment processes. Strong understanding of microservices architecture and integration patterns via **Vertx** and **RXJava**. Experienced in implementing comprehensive testing strategies using **JUnit**, and managing front-end interactions through **TypeScript** and **Angular** frameworks. Additionally, I have a proven track record of contributing to successful projects within top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, leveraging my skills to build robust, scalable systems.
